name: Burns
text:
Burns
Burns was the supervisor at the Silver Mustang Casino.
Biography
After a man won a plethora of jackpots at the Silver Mustang, Burns became visibly stressed and bitterly dismissed the man after giving him his winnings and calling a limousine for him.
Burns was subsequently punished for the man's winnings by Rodney and Bradley Mitchum, the former beating him up and the latter telling him to leave town. His position was filled by Warrick.
